attributes.action: introduce a scheme to reward children, teenagers and youg people who DO NOT partake in crime and anti-social behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long there have been schemes around the country giving offenders "rewards" such as days out. For too long young people who work hard at school, stay out of trouble receive little or no recognition.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/rewards/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
